banner.title: Cookies & privacy
banner.body: I use essential cookies to keep this site running. Optional analytics tools (Google Analytics 4) and marketing tools (Meta Pixel) only load after you consent so I can review usage and campaign performance.

preferences.title: Cookie settings
preferences.description: You can adjust your choice at any time. Essential cookies are required for security, language, and saving your consent state, so they always remain active. Analytics and marketing cookies stay disabled until you opt in.
preferences.essentialDescription: Required for core functions like navigation, security, and remembering your cookie decision.
preferences.analyticsDescription: Enables privacy-friendly measurement with IP anonymization. No personal data is stored or combined with other Google services.
preferences.marketingDescription: Helps measure advertising performance on Meta platforms. Loads tracking scripts only after you consent.

notifications.saved: Your cookie settings have been saved.
